text: Joseph Johnson was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Grimsby Town. ==References== Category:Year of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Rossendale United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Southern Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire Category:Year of birth missing Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Joe Johnson (English footballer)
